Get data from Planit API

Source: R/planit.R
get_planit_data.Rd

This function requests data from [planit.org.uk](https://www.planit.org.uk). See their [API spec](https://www.planit.org.uk/api/) and their [data dictionary](https://www.planit.org.uk/dictionary/) for further information.

get_planit_data(
  bbox,
  query_type = "applics",
  query_type_search = NULL,
  fmt = "geojson",
  base_url = "https://www.planit.org.uk/api",
  limit = 6,
  end_date = as.character(Sys.Date()),
  start_date = "2000-02-01",
  pcode = NULL,
  krad = NULL,
  silent = FALSE
)

Arguments

bbox

Bounding box in the form of xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax, e.g.: `c(-1.3, 53.7, -1.2, 53.9)`
query_type

The type of query (`"applics"` by default)
query_type_search

Text string associated with the `query_type` (may be updated)
fmt

The format of the output (`"geojson"` returns an `sf` object, `"json"` returns a data frame)
base_url

The base URL of the service
limit

How many items to return (e.g. 6, default)
end_date

E.g. `"2009-02-01"`. Default is `as.character(Sys.Date())`.
start_date

E.g. `"2000-02-01"`
pcode

Postcode = UK postcode to use for the centre of a location search
krad

Radius (km) = only planning applications within the circle perimeter are returned (default 2)
silent

Do you want a message? Default is `FALSE`

Value

A (geographic) data frame

Examples

bbox = c(-1.4, 53.7, -1.3, 53.8)
res = get_planit_data(bbox) # return geographic (`sf`) object
#> Getting data from https://www.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=6&bbox=-1.4%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-01-10&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=6
class(res)
#> [1] "sf"         "tbl_df"     "tbl"        "data.frame"
plot(res)
#> Warning: plotting the first 9 out of 16 attributes; use max.plot = 16 to plot all
get_planit_data(bbox, fmt = "json", limit = 2) # return data frame with limit
#> Getting data from https://www.planit.org.uk/api/applics/json?limit=2&bbox=-1.4%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-01-10&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2
#>     doc_type              name
#> 1 PlanApplic Leeds/19/07849/FU
#> 2 PlanApplic Leeds/20/00066/FU
#>                                                                                                                  url
#> 1 https://publicaccess.leeds.gov.uk/online-applications/applicationDetails.do?activeTab=summary&keyVal=Q2SZQ7JBG9200
#> 2 https://publicaccess.leeds.gov.uk/online-applications/applicationDetails.do?activeTab=summary&keyVal=Q3JDREJBGU700
#>                                                                  description
#> 1                            Raised decking area and fencing/glazing to rear
#> 2 First floor side/rear extension; juliet balcony to to side with balustrade
#>                       when_updated authority_id
#> 1 2020-01-09T09:41:10.250000+00:00          292
#> 2 2020-01-09T09:41:10.246000+00:00          292
#>                                                                        source_url
#> 1 https://publicaccess.leeds.gov.uk/online-applications/search.do?action=advanced
#> 2 https://publicaccess.leeds.gov.uk/online-applications/search.do?action=advanced
#>   authority_name                                                    link
#> 1          Leeds https://www.planit.org.uk/planapplic/Leeds/19/07849/FU/
#> 2          Leeds https://www.planit.org.uk/planapplic/Leeds/20/00066/FU/
#>   postcode                                            address      lat
#> 1 LS25 7LH             19 Helena Street Kippax Leeds LS25 7LH 53.76372
#> 2 WF10 2ES 27 Leeds Road Allerton Bywater Castleford WF10 2ES 53.75086
#>         lng start_date         uid
#> 1 -1.381730 2020-01-08 19/07849/FU
#> 2 -1.381721 2020-01-03 20/00066/FU
get_planit_data(bbox, end_date = "2008-01-01", limit = 2) # historic data
#> Getting data from https://www.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=2&bbox=-1.4%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2008-01-01&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2
#> Simple feature collection with 2 features and 15 fields
#> geometry type:  POINT
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -1.388588 ymin: 53.72471 xmax: -1.373375 ymax: 53.79289
#> epsg (SRID):    4326
#> proj4string:    +proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs
#> # A tibble: 2 x 16
#>   doc_type name  url   description when_updated        authority_id source_url
#>   <chr>    <chr> <chr> <chr>       <dttm>                     <int> <chr>     
#> 1 PlanApp… Leed… http… Change of … 2017-07-22 09:42:30          292 https://p…
#> 2 PlanApp… Wake… http… Extension … 2019-08-29 14:45:35          293 https://p…
#> # … with 9 more variables: authority_name <chr>, link <chr>, postcode <chr>,
#> #   address <chr>, lat <dbl>, lng <dbl>, start_date <date>, uid <chr>,
#> #   geometry <POINT [°]>
get_planit_data(bbox, pcode = "LS2 9JT", limit = 2) # data from specific postcode
#> Getting data from https://www.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=2&bbox=-1.4%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-01-10&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2&pcode=LS2%209JT
#> Simple feature collection with 2 features and 16 fields
#> geometry type:  POINT
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -1.55333 ymin: 53.80796 xmax: -1.55333 ymax: 53.80796
#> epsg (SRID):    4326
#> proj4string:    +proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs
#> # A tibble: 2 x 17
#>   doc_type name  distance url   description when_updated        authority_id
#>   <chr>    <chr>    <dbl> <chr> <chr>       <dttm>                     <int>
#> 1 PlanApp… Leed…        0 http… Removal of… 2019-07-23 08:45:04          292
#> 2 PlanApp… Leed…        0 http… Two new of… 2019-02-10 20:52:08          292
#> # … with 10 more variables: source_url <chr>, authority_name <chr>, link <chr>,
#> #   postcode <chr>, address <chr>, lat <dbl>, lng <dbl>, start_date <date>,
#> #   uid <chr>, geometry <POINT [°]>
